title: M ETA -L EARNING VIA C LASSIFIER (- FREE ) G UIDANCE
abstract: classifier-free guidance techniques from image generation to the meta-learning domain. Our experiments show that our methods successfully make use of external task descriptors to produce high-performance adapted networks in the zero-shot setting.

tldr.text: These experiments show that the methods successfully make use of external task descriptors to produce high-performance adapted networks in the zero-shot setting.
